replies.msg:
係Telegram收到呢個message
有冇巴打929係Moscow
Hi everyone, not sure it’s the right channel for the news, but Moscow, in Russia will have, on September 29, a rally in support of political prisoners at Sakharov Avenue on 15-00, while it is not directly a part of the movement, slogans in support could be expected https://www.facebook.com/events/647578119096948/
It would be great if more people could join!
There likely will be censorship of slogans by the police on the entrance checkpoint, usually they censor profanities, and don’t like slogans in anything but Russian, but one can just bring empty boards and write slogans after the checkpoint.
Facebook group has info on time and location. The entrance should be open from 14-00 at this spot https://www.google.com/maps/place/Kalanchevskaya+Ulitsa,+Moskva,+Russia,+107078/@55.7747347,37.6496169,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x46b54a7bddc9bf4d:0xa1fe76c2de93e468!8m2!3d55.7747346!4d37.6518056

岩岩錯link
